1111011001001110 0111100001010001 1 -> sum: 0110111010100000, cout: 1
1101101010010110 0001010100100001 1 -> sum: 1110111110111000, cout: 0
0100111100101100 0111111101001111 1 -> sum: 1100111001111100, cout: 0
0000000001000100 1011110100110111 1 -> sum: 1011110101111100, cout: 0
0111100000000011 0010101101101011 0 -> sum: 1010001101101110, cout: 0
1011110011010010 0010001011001100 1 -> sum: 1101111110011111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
